name: HexBlokz V+
description:
Easy to play yet hard to put down, simply place the hexagons in some free space on the board. Fill a line horizontally or diagonally to remove the line of pieces and create more space. Don’t let the board fill up else its curtains for you.

Discover and develop whole new strategies to maximize your score. With Easy, Medium and Hard levels of play and no time limits you can be sure of finding a mode to suit you.

HexBlokz now contains a tournament mode hosted by our partner Skillz. You can play for virtual or real currency. In order to comply with current legislation, real money tournaments may not be available in your state or country.

Privacy info:
Please note that this game ad-funded. We generate some income to pay for the support and development of the game from advertising. The advertising and social media services use anonymous device identifiers, local storage and cookies. By downloading and continuing to use this game you consent to this information being collected and shared with our advertising and social media partners.

You can choose to remove the adverts via the built in IAP.
